mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_comment (c_content, c_regdate, c_moddate, p_id, m_id, c_check) VALUES (#{ccontent}, #{cregdate}, #{cmoddate}, #{pid}, #{mid}, #{ccheck})
mapper.select: select c_content as ccontent, c_regdate as cregdate, m_name as mname from tbl_comment as c join tbl_member as m on m.m_id = c.m_id where p_id=${pid} and c_check=1
mapper.update: update tbl_comment set c_check = 0 where c_id = ${cid}
